changes.reasoning: Create shared @codewalker/types package to eliminate code duplication. The types were previously duplicated between the web app and CLI. Moving them to a shared package ensures type consistency across all applications.
Move Next.js web app from root to apps/web for proper monorepo organization. This separates the web application from monorepo configuration and allows independent versioning and deployment.
Move CLI from packages/cli to apps/cli. The CLI is an application, not a library, so it belongs in the apps directory following standard monorepo conventions.
Update root package.json to be a pure monorepo orchestrator. Removed all app-specific dependencies (moved to apps/web) and updated workspaces to include both apps/* and packages/*.
Update imports across web app and CLI to use the shared @codewalker/types package instead of local type definitions.
